description:
The Three Cho Sisters learn to use the manipulative magical powers of the Crucial Keys to win over the crowd. Soso holds a gourmet food tasting session and tests the culinary prowess of a local chef named Ten’i.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ten`i, Sousou ni Tamesareru no Koto
典韋, 曹操に試されるのこと
